ghost-of-tsushima.title: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
ghost-of-tsushima.description: Ghost of Tsushima is an open-world action-adventure set in feudal Japan that follows Jin Sakai as he defends Tsushima Island from Mongol invaders. The Director's Cut includes the Iki Island expansion and enhanced PC features.
ghost-of-tsushima.about: Venture into the complete Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT on PC; forge your own path through this open-world action-adventure and uncover its hidden wonders. Developed by Sucker Punch Productions and brought to PC by Nixxes Software.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT

gta-6.title: Grand Theft Auto VI
gta-6.description: The next entry in Rockstar’s legendary open-world action series, set in a dynamic, evolving world of crime and freedom.
gta-6.about: Grand Theft Auto VI is an upcoming action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. It is due to be the eighth main Grand Theft Auto game, following Grand Theft Auto V, and the sixteenth entry overall.

ghost-of-yotei.title: Ghost of Yōtei
ghost-of-yotei.description: A standalone samurai revenge adventure set in 1603 rural Japan, where a lone mercenary hunts those who killed her family.
ghost-of-yotei.about: Ghost of Yōtei is an action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions for PS5, set around Mount Yōtei in 1603.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super / AMD RX 5600 XT

hollow-knight-silksong.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
hollow-knight-silksong.description: A fast, fluid, needle-sharp Metroidvania following Hornet as she ascends through a mysterious haunted kingdom.
hollow-knight-silksong.about: Hollow Knight: Silksong is an upcoming action-platformer developed by Team Cherry. The game follows Hornet, princess-protector of Hallownest, as she's taken to the kingdom of Pharloom and fights her way to the top of the shimmering citadel.

nier-automata.title: NieR: Automata
nier-automata.description: A fast-paced action RPG where androids battle machines in a desolate future Earth.
nier-automata.about: NieR: Automata is an action RPG developed by PlatinumGames and published by Square Enix. Set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by machine lifeforms, players follow android units 2B, 9S, and A2 in a story blending combat, philosophy, and emotional depth.

cyberpunk-2077.title: Cyberpunk 2077
cyberpunk-2077.description: A futuristic open-world RPG set in the neon-soaked streets of Night City.
cyberpunk-2077.about: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action RPG developed by CD Projekt Red. You play as V, a mercenary navigating high-tech body mods, gang wars, and corporate power struggles in a massive dystopian city.

age_rating.description: Violence, Strong Language, Sexual Content, Drugs

avatar-frontiers-of-pandora.title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
avatar-frontiers-of-pandora.description: A first-person open-world adventure set on Pandora where you fight to protect the Na'vi homeland.
avatar-frontiers-of-pandora.about: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Massive Entertainment and published by Ubisoft. You play as a Na'vi raised by the RDA, returning to your roots to explore the Western Frontier of Pandora.

gta-trilogy-definitive-edition.title: Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy – Definitive Edition
gta-trilogy-definitive-edition.description: Remastered versions of GTA III, GTA Vice City, and GTA San Andreas with upgraded visuals and modern controls.
gta-trilogy-definitive-edition.about: GTA Trilogy – Definitive Edition bundles three classics: Grand Theft Auto III, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City, and Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. Developed by Grove Street Games and published by Rockstar Games, it features enhanced lighting, textures, controls, and gameplay improvements for modern systems.

elden-ring.title: Elden Ring
elden-ring.description: A vast dark-fantasy open world where you rise as the Tarnished to claim the Elden Ring.
elden-ring.about: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco. Created with story contributions from George R. R. Martin, it features massive exploration, brutal combat, and deep lore.

red-dead-redemption-2.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
red-dead-redemption-2.description: An epic western open-world adventure from Rockstar Games.
red-dead-redemption-2.about: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games, following Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang in 1899 America.

gta-v.title: Grand Theft Auto V
gta-v.description: The critically acclaimed open world of Grand Theft Auto V and GTA Online.
gta-v.about: When a young street hustler, a retired bank robber and a terrifying psychopath find themselves entangled with some of the most frightening and deranged elements of the criminal underworld, the U.S. government and the entertainment industry, they must pull off a series of dangerous heists to survive in a ruthless city in which they can trust nobody, least of all each other.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz

recommended.cpu: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHz (8 CPUs)

witcher-3.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
witcher-3.description: A massive fantasy RPG following Geralt of Rivia.
witcher-3.about: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an open-world RPG developed by CD Projekt Red. You play as Geralt, a monster hunter searching for Ciri.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Phenom II X4 940

halo-infinite.title: Halo Infinite
halo-infinite.description: Master Chief returns in an open-world Halo adventure.
halo-infinite.about: Halo Infinite is a sci-fi FPS developed by 343 Industries and published by Xbox Game Studios.

forza-horizon-5.title: Forza Horizon 5
forza-horizon-5.description: Blast off to the visually stunning, vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action.
forza-horizon-5.about: Your Ultimate Horizon Adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.

resident-evil-4-remake.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
resident-evil-4-remake.about: Resident Evil 4 Remake is a survival-horror game developed and published by Capcom, retelling Leon Kennedy’s rescue mission with modern visuals.

diablo-iv.title: Diablo IV
diablo-iv.description: Join the fight for Sanctuary in Diablo IV, the ultimate action RPG adventure.
diablo-iv.about: Diablo IV is the ultimate action RPG experience with endless evil to slaughter, countless abilities to master, nightmarish dungeons, and legendary loot.

hogwarts-legacy.title: Hogwarts Legacy
hogwarts-legacy.description: A magical open-world RPG set in the 1800s wizarding world.
hogwarts-legacy.about: Hogwarts Legacy is an open-world action RPG developed by Avalanche Software and published by Warner Bros. Games, letting players live as a student at Hogwarts.

baldurs-gate-3.title: Baldur's Gate 3
baldurs-gate-3.description: A cinematic story-driven RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe.
baldurs-gate-3.about: Baldur's Gate 3 is an RPG developed and published by Larian Studios, featuring deep choices, tactical combat, and branching narratives.

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA RTX 2060 Super / AMD RX 5700 XT

fortnite.title: Fortnite
fortnite.description: Create, play, and battle with friends using the power of Unreal Engine 5.
fortnite.about: Fortnite is a free-to-play Battle Royale game with numerous game modes for every type of game player. Watch a concert, build an island or fight.

genshin-impact.title: Genshin Impact
genshin-impact.description: Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.
genshin-impact.about: You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

apex-legends.title: Apex Legends
apex-legends.about: Apex Legends is a free-to-play hero shooter developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by EA.

league-of-legends.title: League of Legends
league-of-legends.description: A competitive 5v5 MOBA played by millions.
league-of-legends.about: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena game developed and published by Riot Games.

valheim.title: Valheim
valheim.description: A brutal Viking survival game set in a procedurally generated purgatory.
valheim.about: Valheim is a survival and exploration game developed by Iron Gate Studio. You awaken in a vast Norse world where you must craft, build, battle bosses, and survive the wilderness.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Athlon X4 740

starfield.title: Starfield
starfield.description: A next-gen space RPG from Bethesda.
starfield.about: Starfield is an open-universe RPG developed by Bethesda Game Studios, letting players explore star systems, build ships, and uncover mysteries of the cosmos.

monster-hunter-wild.title: Monster Hunter Wilds
monster-hunter-wild.description: The next generation of Monster Hunter with dynamic ecosystems.
monster-hunter-wild.about: Monster Hunter Wilds is an upcoming action RPG by Capcom, evolving the series with seamless environments and improved monster behavior.

witcher-4.title: The Witcher 4
witcher-4.about: The Witcher 4 (officially 'Project Polaris') is the next Witcher saga developed by CD Projekt Red using Unreal Engine 5.

death-stranding.title: Death Stranding
death-stranding.description: A mysterious open-world adventure by Hideo Kojima.
death-stranding.about: Death Stranding is an action game developed by Kojima Productions featuring Sam Bridges reconnecting isolated cities in a fractured America.

minecraft.title: Minecraft
minecraft.description: A sandbox world of infinite creativity.
minecraft.about: Minecraft is a survival sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios, featuring exploration, crafting, and building.

roblox.title: Roblox
roblox.description: A massive platform of user-created games.
roblox.about: Roblox is an online game platform and creation system developed by Roblox Corporation.

doom-eternal.title: DOOM Eternal
doom-eternal.description: Hell’s armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer using an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions.
doom-eternal.about: Experience the ultimate combination of speed and power with the next leap in push-forward, first-person combat. As the DOOM Slayer, you return to find Earth has suffered a demonic invasion.

stalker-2.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
stalker-2.description: Discover the vast Chornobyl Exclusion Zone full of dangerous enemies, deadly anomalies and powerful artifacts.
stalker-2.about: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a next-gen sequel to the award-winning franchise, developed by GSC Game World. Experience a unique blend of FPS, immersive sim, and horror.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB

recommended.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER

call-of-duty-black-ops-6.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
call-of-duty-black-ops-6.description: Signature Black Ops across a cinematic single-player Campaign, a best-in-class Multiplayer experience and the epic return of Round-Based Zombies.
call-of-duty-black-ops-6.about: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller developed by Treyarch and Raven Software. Set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 470 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960

recommended.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti

dragon-age-the-veilguard.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard
dragon-age-the-veilguard.description: Enter the world of Thedas, a vibrant land of rugged wilderness, treacherous labyrinths, and glittering cities.
dragon-age-the-veilguard.about: Dragon Age: The Veilguard is an immersive single-player RPG where you become the leader others believe in. Unite the Veilguard and defy the gods.

space-marine-2.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
space-marine-2.description: Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor's warriors.
space-marine-2.about: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is a third-person shooter hack-n-slash game. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 580 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060

recommended.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070

black-myth-wukong.title: Black Myth: Wukong
black-myth-wukong.description: An action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead.
black-myth-wukong.about: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG developed by Game Science, based on the classic Chinese novel Journey to the West. It features stunning visuals and fast-paced combat.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT

helldivers-2.title: Helldivers 2
helldivers-2.description: The Galaxy's Last Line of Offence. Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy.
helldivers-2.about: Helldivers 2 is a 3rd person squad-based shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. Join forces with up to 4 friends and wreak havoc on an alien scourge threatening the safety of Super Earth.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT

valorant.title: Valorant
valorant.description: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities.
valorant.about: VALORANT is a competitive tactical shooter from Riot Games. Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage. You have 13 rounds to attack and defend your side using sharp gunplay and tactical abilities.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / AMD Athlon 200GE

counterstrike-2.title: Counter-Strike 2
counterstrike-2.description: The next installment of the world's premier tactical shooter, built on the Source 2 engine.
counterstrike-2.about: Counter-Strike 2 is the largest technical leap forward in Counter-Strike’s history, ensuring new features and updates for years to come. All of your items from CS:GO are coming with you.

dota-2.title: Dota 2
dota-2.description: The most-played game on Steam, a deep and complex MOBA with a massive competitive scene.
dota-2.about: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover.

minimum.cpu: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz

overwatch-2.title: Overwatch 2
overwatch-2.description: A team-based hero shooter set in an optimistic future, featuring evolving 5v5 combat.
overwatch-2.about: Overwatch 2 is a free-to-play, team-based action game set in the optimistic future, where every match is the ultimate 5v5 battlefield brawl.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i3 / AMD Phenom X3 8650
minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 600 series / AMD Radeon HD 7000 series

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 380

warframe.title: Warframe
warframe.description: Embody a powerful techno-organic warrior and slice through hordes of enemies in this fast-paced cooperative shooter.
warframe.about: Warframe is a cooperative free-to-play third person online action game set in an evolving sci-fi world. Join your friends in player-vs-enemy raids across the solar system and master the power of the Warframes.

destiny-2.title: Destiny 2
destiny-2.description: Dive into the world of Destiny 2 to explore the mysteries of the solar system and experience responsive first-person shooter combat.
destiny-2.about: Destiny 2 is an action MMO with a single evolving world that you and your friends can join anytime, anywhere, absolutely free.

hades.title: Hades
hades.description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.
hades.about: Hades is a god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler that combines the best aspects of Supergiant's critically acclaimed titles, including the fast-paced action of Bastion, the rich atmosphere and depth of Transistor, and the character-driven storytelling of Pyre.

rainbow-six-siege.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
rainbow-six-siege.description: Master the art of destruction and gadgetry in Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege.
rainbow-six-siege.about: Face intense close-quarters combat, high lethality, tactical decision making, team play and explosive action within every moment. Experience a new era of fierce fire fights and expert strategy born from the rich legacy of past Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six games.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i3 530 / AMD Phenom II X4 945
minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5870

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7970

sekiro-shadows-die-twice.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
sekiro-shadows-die-twice.description: Carve your own clever path to vengeance in the award-winning adventure from developer FromSoftware.
sekiro-shadows-die-twice.about: In Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice you are the 'one-armed wolf', a disgraced and disfigured warrior rescued from the brink of death. Bound to protect a young lord who is the descendant of an ancient bloodline, you become the target of many vicious enemies.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570

stardew-valley.title: Stardew Valley
stardew-valley.description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?
stardew-valley.about: Stardew Valley is an open-ended country-life RPG! You’ve inherited your grandfather’s old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life.

palworld.title: Palworld
palworld.description: A survival, crafting, and creature-collection game set in an open world with quirky creatures called 'Pals'.
palworld.about: Fight, farm, build and work alongside mysterious creatures called 'Pals' in this completely new multi-player, open world survival and crafting game!

silent-hill-2.title: Silent Hill 2 (Remake)
silent-hill-2.description: Experience a master-class in psychological survival horror—lauded as the best in the series—on the latest hardware.
silent-hill-2.about: Having received a letter from his deceased wife, James returns to where they made so many memories, in the hope of seeing her one last time: Silent Hill.

minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT

metaphor-refantazio.title: Metaphor: ReFantazio
metaphor-refantazio.description: A grand fantasy RPG from the creative minds behind Persona 3, 4, and 5.
metaphor-refantazio.about: Metaphor: ReFantazio is an all-new fantasy RPG from the creative minds behind Persona. Players will forge their own destiny and face their fears to become the leader the kingdom needs.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 580

star-wars-jedi-survivor.title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
star-wars-jedi-survivor.description: Continuing the story of Cal Kestis in a grand-scale adventure across the galaxy.
star-wars-jedi-survivor.about: The story of Cal Kestis continues in STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor™, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580

resident-evil-2-remake.title: Resident Evil 2 (Remake)
resident-evil-2-remake.description: A masterpiece reborn, Resident Evil 2 returns with deeper immersion and modern visuals.
resident-evil-2-remake.about: The genre-defining masterpiece Resident Evil 2 returns, completely rebuilt from the ground up for a deeper narrative experience. Using Capcom’s proprietary RE Engine, Resident Evil 2 offers a fresh take on the classic survival horror saga with breathtakingly realistic visuals.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480

paladins.title: Paladins
paladins.description: Join 50+ million players in Paladins, the free-to-play fantasy team-based shooter.
paladins.about: Wield guns and magic as a legendary Champion of the Realm, customizing your core set of abilities to play exactly how you want to play.

minimum.cpu: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz / Athlon X2 2.7 GHz

recommended.cpu: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 965

smite.title: SMITE
smite.description: Play for free and join over 35 million players in SMITE, the world’s most popular action MOBA.
smite.about: Enter the Battleground of the Gods! SMITE is a free-to-play third-person Action MOBA, featuring a diverse roster of 100+ Gods from various pantheons.

minimum.cpu: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz / Athlon X2 2.7 GHz

recommended.cpu: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 965

hearthstone.title: Hearthstone
hearthstone.description: Deceptively simple. Insanely fun. Collect cards and battle other players in this fast-paced strategy card game.
hearthstone.about: Hearthstone is a free-to-play online digital collectible card game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment.

minimum.cpu: Intel Pentium D / AMD Athlon 64 X2
minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 / ATI Radeon X1600 Pro

recommended.cpu: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 X2
recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro

lost-ark.title: Lost Ark
lost-ark.description: Embark on an odyssey for the Lost Ark in a vast, vibrant world: explore new lands, seek out lost treasures, and test yourself in thrilling action combat.
lost-ark.about: Lost Ark is a massive multiplayer online action role-playing game (MMOARPG). Explore a huge world with countless quests and dungeons to discover.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850

rocket-league.title: Rocket League
rocket-league.description: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition.
rocket-league.about: Take to the pitch for a fully-featured offline season mode, multiple game types, casual and competitive online matches, and special 'Mutators' that let you change the rules entirely.

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better / ATI 7950 or better

fall-guys.title: Fall Guys
fall-guys.description: Fall Guys is a free, cross-platform, massively multiplayer, party royale game where you and your fellow contestants compete through escalating rounds of absurd obstacle course chaos.
fall-guys.about: You’re invited to dive and dodge your way to victory in the pantheon of clumsy! Rookie or pro? Solo or party? Fall Guys delivers ever-evolving, high-concentrated hilarity and fun.

the-sims-4.title: The Sims 4
the-sims-4.description: Unleash your imagination and create a unique world of Sims that’s an expression of you! Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes, and much more.
the-sims-4.about: The Sims 4 is the ultimate life simulation game—create unique characters, build dream homes, and explore vibrant worlds.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i3-3220 / AMD Phenom II X4 965

pubg-battlegrounds.title: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS
pubg-battlegrounds.description: Land, loot, and outwit your opponents to become the last player standing in a thrilling game experience full of unexpected, adrenaline-pumping moments.
pubg-battlegrounds.about: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB

eve-online.title: EVE Online
eve-online.description: EVE Online is a community-driven spaceship MMO where players can play free, choosing their own path from countless options.
eve-online.about: Experience space exploration, immense PvP and PvE battles, mining, industry and a sophisticated player economy in an ever-expanding sandbox.

minimum.cpu: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz / AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz
minimum.gpu: AMD Radeon 2600 XT / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

war-thunder.title: War Thunder
war-thunder.description: War Thunder is the most comprehensive free-to-play, cross-platform, MMO military game dedicated to aviation, armoured vehicles, and naval craft from WWII and the Cold War.
war-thunder.about: Join now and take part in major battles on land, in the air, and at sea, fighting with millions of players from all over the world in an ever-evolving environment.

minimum.gpu: DirectX 10.1 compliant video card: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon 4670 / NVIDIA GeForce GT 520

recommended.gpu: DirectX 11 compliant video card or higher and 2GB VRAM: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280

world-of-tanks.title: World of Tanks
world-of-tanks.description: Jump into the free-to-play team-based shooter with an ever-expanding roster of historical vehicles, stunning graphics, spectacular locales, and orchestral scores.
world-of-tanks.about: Command over 600 machines from the mid-20th century and test your mettle against other players in ultimate tank battles.

minimum.cpu: Intel Pentium E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850

world-of-warships.title: World of Warships
world-of-warships.description: Experience epic, free-to-play naval combat when you take command of one of over 400 historical vessels.
world-of-warships.about: World of Warships is the ultimate free-to-play naval action game, providing equal access to all gameplay features.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Athlon II X2 245
minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 / AMD Radeon HD 6670 / Intel HD 4000

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270

path-of-exile.title: Path of Exile
path-of-exile.description: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to take your revenge against those who wronged you.
path-of-exile.about: Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in the dark fantasy world of Wraeclast. It is designed around a deep character customization system and core item economy.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7850

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / ATI Radeon RX 560

no-mans-sky.title: No Man's Sky
no-mans-sky.description: Inspired by the adventure and imagination that we love from classic science-fiction, No Man's Sky presents you with a galaxy to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action.
no-mans-sky.about: In No Man's Sky, every star is the light of a distant sun, each orbited by planets filled with life, and you can go to any of them you choose.

inside.title: INSIDE
inside.description: Hunted and alone, a boy finds himself drawn into the center of a dark project.
inside.about: INSIDE is a 2D puzzle-platformer developed and published by Playdead, similar in style to their previous title Limbo.

minimum.cpu: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 / AMD FX 8120

celeste.title: Celeste
celeste.description: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight platformer from the creators of TowerFall.
celeste.about: A narrative-driven, single-player adventure like mom used to make, with a charming cast of characters and a touching story of self-discovery.

hades-ii.title: Hades II
hades-ii.description: Battle beyond the Underworld using dark magic to take on the Titan of Time in this bewitching sequel to the award-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler.
hades-ii.about: The first-ever sequel from Supergiant Games builds on the best aspects of the original god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler in an all-new, action-packed, endlessly replayable experience rooted in the Underworld of Greek myth and its deep connections to the dawn of witchcraft.

ori-and-the-will-of-the-wisps.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
ori-and-the-will-of-the-wisps.description: Embark on an all-new adventure in a vast, exotic world where you’ll encounter towering enemies and challenging puzzles on your quest to unravel Ori’s destiny.
ori-and-the-will-of-the-wisps.about: The little spirit Ori is no stranger to peril, but when a fateful flight puts the owlet Ku in harm’s way, it will take more than quite courage to bring a family back together, heal a broken land, and discover Ori’s true destiny.

minimum.cpu: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460

journey.title: Journey
journey.description: Explore the ancient, mysterious world of Journey as you soar above ruins and glide across sands to discover its secrets.
journey.about: Explore the ancient, mysterious world of Journey as you soar above ruins and glide across sands to discover its secrets. Play alone or with a companion and explore its vast world together.

control.title: Control
control.description: Winner of over 80 awards, Control is a visually stunning third-person action-adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
control.about: After a secretive agency in New York is invaded by an otherworldly threat, you become the new Director struggling to regain Control.

minimum.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 | AMD Radeon R9 280X

recommended.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660/1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580

disco-elysium.title: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut
disco-elysium.description: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is a groundbreaking role playing game.
disco-elysium.about: You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city block to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders or take bribes.

assassins-creed-valhalla.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
assassins-creed-valhalla.description: Become a legendary Viking raider on a quest for glory.
assassins-creed-valhalla.about: Become a legendary Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory. Raid your enemies, grow your settlement, and build your political power in the quest to earn a place among the gods in Valhalla.

recommended.gpu: AMD RX 5700 XT | NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080

metro-exodus.title: Metro Exodus
metro-exodus.description: Flee the shattered ruins of the Moscow Metro and embark on an epic, continent-spanning journey across the post-apocalyptic Russian wilderness.
metro-exodus.about: Metro Exodus is an epic, story-driven first person shooter from 4A Games that blends deadly combat and stealth with exploration and survival horror in one of the most immersive game worlds ever created.

marvel-rivals.title: Marvel Rivals
marvel-rivals.description: Marvel Rivals is a Super Hero Team-Based PVP Shooter.
marvel-rivals.about: Assemble an all-star Marvel squad, devise countless strategies and powers to outplay your enemies in destructible battlefields.

the-finals.title: THE FINALS
the-finals.description: Join THE FINALS, the world-famous, free-to-play, combat-centered game show!
the-finals.about: Fight alongside your teammates in virtual arenas that you can alter, exploit, and even destroy. Build your own playstyle in this first-person shooter.

team-fortress-2.title: Team Fortress 2
team-fortress-2.description: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities.
team-fortress-2.about: One of the most popular online action games of all time, Team Fortress 2 delivers constant free updates—new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats.

warhammer-40,000-space-marine-2.title: Warhammer 40,000 Space Marine 2

warhammer-40,000-space-marine-2.about: Warhammer 40,000 Space Marine 2 features stunning graphics and gameplay. Join millions of players in this epic adventure.
